java/liquibase/preconditions/Preconditions.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.MigrationFailedException;
00004 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00005 
00006 import java.util.List;
00007 import java.util.ArrayList;
00008 
00009 public class Preconditions extends AndPrecondition {
00010 
00011     public enum FailOption {
00012         HALT("HALT"),
00013         CONTINUE("CONTINUE"),
00014         MARK_RAN("MARK_RAN"),
00015         WARN("WARN");
00016 
00017         String key;
00018 
00019         FailOption(String key) {
00020             this.key = key;
00021         }
00022 
00023         public String toString() {
00024             return key;
00025         }
00026     }
00027 
00028     public enum ErrorOption {
00029         HALT("HALT"),
00030         CONTINUE("CONTINUE"),
00031         MARK_RAN("MARK_RAN"),
00032         WARN("WARN");
00033 
00034         String key;
00035 
00036         ErrorOption(String key) {
00037             this.key = key;
00038         }
00039 
00040         public String toString() {
00041             return key;
00042         }
00043     }
00044 
00045     private FailOption onFail = FailOption.HALT;
00046     private ErrorOption onError = ErrorOption.HALT;
00047 
00048     public FailOption getOnFail() {
00049         return onFail;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void setOnFail(String onFail) {
00053         if (onFail == null) {
00054             this.onFail = FailOption.HALT;
00055         } else {
00056             for (FailOption option : FailOption.values()) {
00057                 if (option.key.equalsIgnoreCase(onFail)) {
00058                     this.onFail = option;
00059                     return;
00060                 }
00061             }
00062             List<String> possibleOptions = new ArrayList<String>();
00063             for (FailOption option : FailOption.values()) {
00064                 possibleOptions.add(option.key);
00065             }
00066             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown onFail attribute value '"+onFail+"'.  Possible values: " + StringUtils.join(possibleOptions, ", "));
00067         }
00068     }
00069 
00070     public ErrorOption getOnError() {
00071         return onError;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public void setOnError(String onError) {
00075         if (onError == null) {
00076             this.onError = ErrorOption.HALT;
00077         } else {
00078             for (ErrorOption option : ErrorOption.values()) {
00079                 if (option.key.equalsIgnoreCase(onError)) {
00080                     this.onError = option;
00081                     return;
00082                 }
00083             }
00084             List<String> possibleOptions = new ArrayList<String>();
00085             for (ErrorOption option : ErrorOption.values()) {
00086                 possibleOptions.add(option.key);
00087             }
00088             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown onError attribute value '"+onError+"'.  Possible values: " + StringUtils.join(possibleOptions, ", "));
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }
